about_me.title: About Me
about_me.intro: My name is Lukas Bühler, I was born and raised in Switzerland and I'm currently {{my_age}} years old.
about_me.text1:
At the moment I am working as a trainee software developer at Belsoft Collaboration AG in Zürich.
But I am not only a fulltime developer at work, I also work on multiple projects in my freetime. Check it out in the development section.
Besides being a developer I am also a ski coach for the Ski Club Beverin in Graubünden.,
about_me.phrase: Skiing has always been a big passion for me and I probably couldn't do without it.

contact.title: Contact
contact.text: If you wish to contact me I'd like to point you to my e-mail.
